title: Introducing Tailfin’s Long Top Tube Bag
content:
Josh Bryceland, yes that Josh Bryceland, lands the biggest catch of his life, reeling in a whopper of the new Tailfin Long Top Tube Bag. After years of prototyping, testing and refining Tailfin is launching its newest essential bag range. Check out more at Tailfin.

The post Introducing Tailfin’s Long Top Tube Bag appeared first on The Radavist.
author: John Watson
